word: AMONG THOSE WHO TOOK PART IN THESE EXTRAORDINARY FORMS OF FANATICISM WERE SOME WHO HAD ONCE BEEN FAITHFUL, GOD-FEARING BRETHREN AND SISTERS. THE STRANGE EXERCISINGS OF BODY AND MIND WERE CARRIED TO SUCH LENGTHS THAT IN A FEW PLACES THE OFFICERS OF THE LAW FELT COMPELLED TO RESTRAIN THEM BY CASTING THEM INTO PRISON. THE CAUSE OF GOD WAS THUS BROUGHT INTO DISREPUTE AND IT TOOK YEARS TO OUTLIVE THE INFLUENCE THAT THESE EXHIBITIONS OF FANATICISM HAD UPON THE GENERAL PUBLIC.
